csl:
<style xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
    class="in-text"
    xml:lang="en"
    version="1.0">
  <info>
    <id></id>
    <title></title>
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>

    <citation>
        <option name="disambiguate-add-givenname" value="true"/>
        <option name="givenname-disambiguation-rule" value="all-names"/>
        <option name="disambiguate-add-year-suffix" value="true"/>
        <layout delimiter="; ">
            <names variable="author" delimiter=", ">
                <name and="text" delimiter-precedes-last="never" delimiter=", " form="short" initialize-with="."/>
            </names>
            <group prefix=" (" suffix=")">
                <date variable="issued">
                    <date-part name="year"/>
                </date>
                <text variable="year-suffix"/>
            </group>
        </layout>
    </citation>
</style>
result: Asthma, Bosworth Bronchitis and C. Cold (1980); Asthma, Beauregarde Bronchitis and O. Cold (1995)
